hero.imageAlt: Illustration of a whistle rallying a crowd
hero.note: The whistle is a symbol of community solidarity and a functional tool. Whistles really are not for harassing certain masked agents. They are for letting neighbors know there is a safety risk present. Please be mindful and safe.

codesSectionNote: Do not blow continuously. Continuous whistle noise prevents important audio from being captured on video, including anything the abductee says (such as a phone number) or anything the abductors are saying.
